20101229192205.000|20101229192206.000|CC1|SPROUTS.                        
20101229192206.000|20101229192207.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT INVESTIGATORS THINK  
20101229192207.000|20101229192209.000|CC1|THE SALMONELLA OUTBREAK STEMS   
20101229192209.000|20101229192210.000|CC1|FROM AN ORGANIC FARM IN ILLINOIS
20101229192210.000|20101229192213.000|CC1|CALLED TINY GREENS.             
20101229192213.000|20101229192215.000|CC1|DR. CLAUDIA HOYEN IS AN         
20101229192215.000|20101229192218.000|CC1|INFECTIOUS DISEASE PHYSICIAN AT 
20101229192218.000|20101229192219.000|CC1|UH CASE MEDICAL CENTER IN

20101229192220.000|20101229192221.000|CC1|TELL ME ABOUT THE KINDS OF      
20101229192221.000|20101229192223.000|CC1|SYMPTOMS PEOPLE WILL EXPERIENCE 
20101229192223.000|20101229192224.000|CC1|IF THEY HAVE CONTRACTED

20101229192227.000|20101229192230.000|CC1|>> THE THINGS THAT PEOPLE WILL  
20101229192230.000|20101229192231.000|CC1|NOTICE IF THEY HAVE SALMONELLA, 
20101229192231.000|20101229192233.000|CC1|THEY MAY HAVE FEVER INITIALLY.  
20101229192233.000|20101229192235.000|CC1|THEY MIGHT HAVE SOME VOMITING

20101229192243.000|20101229192245.000|CC1|MEANING THAT THERE ISN'T

20101229192248.000|20101229192250.000|CC1|FOUR AND FIVE DAYS.             
20101229192250.000|20101229192251.000|CC1|AND THEN THE SYMPTOMS WILL      
20101229192251.000|20101229192252.000|CC1|RESOLVE.                        
20101229192252.000|20101229192253.000|CC1|THE TIME THAT WE WORRY ABOUT    
20101229192253.000|20101229192256.000|CC1|SALMONELLA IS IN LITTLE KIDS, SO
20101229192256.000|20101229192257.000|CC1|TYPICALLY -- ESPECIALLY CHILDREN

20101229192302.000|20101229192306.000|CC1|OR HAVE OTHER COMPLICATIONS FROM

20101229192310.000|20101229192315.000|CC1|>> TELL ME ABOUT THESE ALFALFA

20101229192328.000|20101229192330.000|CC1|RELATED TO OUTBREAKS IN THE     
20101229192330.000|20101229192330.000|CC1|PAST.                           
20101229192330.000|20101229192332.000|CC1|BUT PRETTY MUCH ANY TYPE OF     
20101229192332.000|20101229192337.000|CC1|FRESH FOOD THAT YOU EAT OR ALSO 
20101229192337.000|20101229192339.000|CC1|LIKE EGGS, IF YOU DON'T COOK

20101229192400.000|20101229192401.000|CC1|YOU'VE CHOSEN.                  
20101229192401.000|20101229192403.000|CC1|>> DR. HOYEN, THANK YOU FOR     
20101229192403.000|20101229192403.000|CC1|JOINING US.                     
20101229192403.000|20101229192405.000|CC1|WE APPRECIATE YOUR EXPERTISE.   
20101229192405.000|20101229192407.000|CC1|I JUST WANT TO MENTION THAT THE 
20101229192407.000|20101229192410.000|CC1|ALFALFA SPROUTS APPARENTLY WERE 
20101229192410.000|20101229192412.000|CC1|DISTRIBUTED THROUGH A SANDWICH

20101229194944.000|20101229194944.000|CC1|  Lunesta helps you fall asleep 
20101229194944.000|20101229194947.000|CC1|        and stay asleep,        
20101229194947.000|20101229194947.000|CC1|           so you can           
20101229194947.000|20101229194950.000|CC1|     wake up feeling rested.    
20101229194950.000|20101229194950.000|CC1|When taking Lunesta, don't drive
20101229194950.000|20101229194952.000|CC1|      or operate machinery      
20101229194952.000|20101229194954.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20101229194954.000|20101229194954.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20101229194954.000|20101229194957.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20101229194957.000|20101229194957.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20101229194957.000|20101229194959.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,  
20101229194959.000|20101229195001.000|CC1|       have been reported.      
20101229195001.000|20101229195001.000|CC1| Abnormal behaviors may include 
20101229195001.000|20101229195003.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,   
20101229195003.000|20101229195005.000|CC1|  hallucinations or confusion.  
20101229195005.000|20101229195005.000|CC1|     In depressed patients,     
20101229195005.000|20101229195007.000|CC1|    worsening of depression,    
20101229195007.000|20101229195007.000|CC1|   including risk of suicide,   
20101229195007.000|20101229195009.000|CC1|           may occur.           
20101229195009.000|20101229195009.000|CC1|           Alcohol may          
20101229195009.000|20101229195011.000|CC1|      increase these risks.     
20101229195011.000|20101229195011.000|CC1|    Allergic reactions, such    
20101229195011.000|20101229195013.000|CC1|  as tongue or throat swelling, 
20101229195013.000|20101229195016.000|CC1| occur rarely and may be fatal. 
20101229195016.000|20101229195016.000|CC1|    Side effects may include    
20101229195016.000|20101229195018.000|CC1|   unpleasant taste, headache,  
20101229195018.000|20101229195018.000|CC1|            dizziness           
20101229195018.000|20101229195020.000|CC1|     and morning drowsiness.
